body:
So when i was playing old avicus like 1 year ago, i spotted these two twins hackers..
I checked on them and they was playing avicus like 6 months ago and i can see they quitted this server. And i also took a video out of it, because it was too obvious lol xD.
Admins, if you are seeing this, ban him or kick, him, i don't care because this is not a report anyway i just want to show you guys how you can spot hackers.
This is for Fun!
URL:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pjj1M4bDHzg&list=UUbl-li6gY7wr7Qep5mEQqsQ

replies.body:
Two things, if it is not a report, there is no use making this thread.
Secondly Why would you need to bump your own thread after 7 minutes?

replies.body:
Rule breakers are supposed to be private, its basically public humiliation.
Catching a rule breaker isn't something you show off about and share on the forums..
